page.title: 05INTERVIEW WITH EX-MAYOR
page.content: MR.E.P.CISSELL WAS ASKED ABOUT THE TOWN'S FUTURE.THERE ARE GREAT EXPANSION PLANS FOR DIDCOT.HE THOUGHT IT WOULD IMPROVE IN MOST WAYS IN THE NEXT FEW YEARS.9,000 HOUSES ARE GOING TO BE BUILT IN THE NEXT 10-12 YEARS(THOUGH THERE ARE NO PLANS FOR DIDCOT TO JOIN UP WITH EAST HAGBOURNE).THE POPULATION WILL RISE FROM 16,000 TO 25,000.DIDCOT HAS DEVELOPED AND PROSPERED OVER THE YEARS AND THE POWER STATION REMAINS A GREAT SOURCE OF EMPLOYMENT.THERE IS RELATIVELY LITTLE UNEMPLOYMENT AND LITTLE VIOLENCE.
